metadata.title: CVE-2024-2612 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: If an attacker could find a way to trigger a particular code path in`SafeRefPtr`, it could have triggered a crash or potentially be leveragedto achieve code execution. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 124,Firefox ESR < 115.9, and Thunderbird < 115.9.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs102 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
